pullrequest.title: Draft of SDF elements section (<level> and <performer>)

content.raw:
These tags are very specific to ignition gazebo, and specific to a particular algorithm. We should keep SDF as general purpose as possible. 

I propose that we broaden the scope of this design to include an `<extension>` concept to SDF. An `<extension>` would allow use to cleanly add data to an SDF file that is targeted toward a specific application or use case. The `<extension>` concept deserves it's own design.

Alternatively, you could capture these new tags in a plugin, or move them to a separate configuration file.
content.html:
These tags are very specific to ignition gazebo, and specific to a particular algorithm. We should keep SDF as general purpose as possible.

I propose that we broaden the scope of this design to include an <extension> concept to SDF. An <extension> would allow use to cleanly add data to an SDF file that is targeted toward a specific application or use case. The <extension> concept deserves it's own design.

Alternatively, you could capture these new tags in a plugin, or move them to a separate configuration file.
